name: Be a part of Decapitated Society!
description:
(Decapitated Society - Deluxe Edition) 
Name in the credits, their face printed on the actual disk.
*Email your photo to info (AT) ockumsrazor (DOT) com
- You will receive the download link via email.

The digital version has the new music, plus all twenty-nine of our previously released material that is out of print. It also contains our last EP, which was released only digitally.

http://bit.ly/OR-Store

name: Physical pre-order w/ CD Release ticket.
description: Details: Free shipping included. Merchandise will be shipped once duplicated and received. You will be emailed w/ notification of the date it will be released and shipped. In addition, we will mail you a free ticket to our CD Release show it to take place n the coming months. After it is booked and such. The album will have one disk w/ all of our newest material and a bonus live track called,"Walk Away". Disk two features previously never before released material in a physical format, in addition to most of our past catalogue that is out of print. 30 songs in all total. Over and hour and a half of music total! All pre-orders of the album will also get their name in the credits, as well.

name: Deluxe Edition w/ Exec. Prod. Credit.
description:
Executive producer credit, email w/ link to the deluxe digital edition of the album & their face printed on the actual disk.
*Email your photo to info (AT) ockumsrazor (DOT) com 
- You will receive the download link via email.

The digital version has the new music, plus all twenty-nine of our previously released material that is out of print. It also contains our last EP, which was released only digitally.

http://bit.ly/OR-Store

name: Exclusive Bundle w/ CD & Shirt or Hat
description:
Free shipping included. Merchandise will be shipped once duplicated and received. You will be emailed w/ notification of the date it will be released and shipped. In addition, you will receive a free ticket to our CD Release show to take place in the coming months. After it is booked and such. The album will have one disk w/ all of our newest material and a bonus live track called,"Walk Away". Disk two features music never before released in a physical format, in addition to most of our past catalogue that is out of print. 30 songs in all. Over an hour and a half of music total! All pre-orders of this album will not only get their name in the credits, but also get the CD signed by each member of the band. This exclusive bundle pack includes your choice of either the OR 10th Anniversary T-shirt or the "trucker" style hat.  Plus, you get your face on the actual CD itself! After making your purchase, be sure to email your image to the following address: info (AT) ockumsrazor (DOT) com

http://bit.ly/OR-Store
